name: CGENcore
description:
Become the Crypto Tycoon! The more you click, the richer you get. Your goal is to collect as much Crypto as you can, buy as much tech as you can and conquer the world!

Features:
- Infinite Gameplay;
- Various tech upgrades to help you extract more crypto;
- Achievements (Steam Achievements support is coming soon).

The game is currently in BETA state and will be updated with more content in upcoming updates.
developers: O L Y M P U S
publishers: O L Y M P U S
